text:
Adds a cforms doctype to the default publication to show the possibilites of
CForms/Ajax together with Lenya.

There is still an issue with saving the document when Ajax is used.
creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com

text:
Created attachment 16681
Add cforms/ajax example to default publication.

The patch/example is based on work done by Thorsten. Muchas gracias!
